document.full_text: "west side story" and "gypsy" playwright arthur laurents died in new york city on thursday from complications of pneumonia, his agent said on friday. laurents was 93.
document.title: "west side story" playwright dies in new york city
lines_and_colors: "west side story" and "gypsy" playwright arthur laurents died in new york city on thursday from complications of pneumonia, his agent said on friday. laurents was 93.
